author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA FORECAST TO BECOME A LARGE HURRICANE OVER THE EARLY PART OF THIS WEEK... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND GUSTY WINDS POSSIBLE FOR COASTAL SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...PRISCILLA FORECAST TO BECOME A LARGE HURRICANE OVER THE EARLY PART OF THIS WEEK... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND GUSTY WINDS POSSIBLE FOR COASTAL SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 8:00 AM MST Sun Oct 05 the center of Priscilla was located near 16.4, -107.1 with movement NNW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 991 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...PRISCILLA FORECAST TO BECOME A LARGE HURRICANE OVER THE EARLY PART OF THIS WEEK... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND GUSTY WINDS POSSIBLE FOR COASTAL SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 8:00 AM MST Sun Oct 05 the center of Priscilla was located near 16.4, -107.1 with movement NNW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 991 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
